body:
Comment 2 by **liu.kz.2010**: 
// test.go 
package main

/*
#cgo windows,386 LDFLAGS: libfoo.a -lstdc++
int foo1();
*/
import "C"
import "fmt"

func main() {
	C.foo1()
	fmt.Println()
}

/*
Windows XP(SP3)
gcc version 4.8.1 (tdm-2) 
output: 
main(.text): non-pc-relative relocation address is too big: 0x1004e3a98
main(.text): non-pc-relative relocation address is too big: 0x1004e3a98
main(.text): undefined: pthread_key_create
main(.text): undefined: pthread_once
main(.text): undefined: pthread_setspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_setspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_setspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_setspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
main(.text): undefined: pthread_getspecific
*/
Attachments: 1. libfoo.a (117492 bytes)
